content:
I think long term it would be good to use the structure of the files to show what the files are and what artists they relate to etc. I may just play around with a small amount of data to get a feel for the tools first, and maybe I will just label that manually for now. So say I get a database that has labels for...

Document type:
- CD booklet
- Artist biography
- Press article
- Infomail (a caompany wide-email with info about the release sent by the capaign manager)
